blog.name: lazydoodlesandfanfic
blog.title: ~Lazy Doodles and Fanfic~
blog.description: *REQUESTS ARE CLOSED * *NO SMUT* Welcome! I answer any and all questions, and here's the rules for requesting: https://lazydoodlesandfanfic.tumblr.com/post/169265737568/rules

summary: I Still Love You (Bucky Barnes X Fem!Reader)
title: I Still Love You (Bucky Barnes X Fem!Reader)
body:
Characters: Bucky Barnes x Fem!Reader, Tony Stark X Sister!Reader

Universe: Marvel, Avengers

Warnings: Spoilers of Civil War

Request: With the stark reader and Bucky one, can you do where he blames himself for the death of readers and Tony’s parents, but she still loves him, even though Tony doesn’t allow it. Eventually Tony and reader have a heart to heart and gives her his blessing. Bucky puts aside his guilt?

“James, please look at me.” You pleaded desperately. He was so broken. You were so broken… everything was so, so broken, in total shatters and here you were trying to pick up the pieces as best you could, and so far it was all failing.

He refused to look at you. The last time he looked at you in the eye was yesterday, and then he immediately look away and looked in so much pain. You knew why, and that hurt even more.

You knew he loved you. He loved you to hell and back, and you felt the exact same. However, weeks ago a series of events broke up the Avengers, Bucky was found, and accused of the murder of a king… it was all messy.

You were Tony’s sister by a good ten years, a definite late arrival to the family- you barely remembered your parents. That’s probably what softened the blow when Tony told you that Bucky had been the one to kill them. However, that wasn’t the only factor that made you side more with him. Due to your young age and Tony not being exactly stable to raise you, you were put under care and in a twisted turn of events, HYDRA got their grubby hands on you, and made sure your carers were agents of HYDRA. They exposed you to a lot of awful things while also keeping your brother away from you so he wouldn’t know. Some of those things you still hadn’t told Tony about to this day. He barely scratched the surface. But Bucky? Bucky knew everything.

You had met Bucky a young teenager, when your ‘foster father’ had brought him to the house. You had stumbled into the room, seeing the winter soldier sat at the table, metal arm out as your foster parent worked on it. Your eyes immediately met, but nothing was said. Years later you found out that he had gone on a mission, injured his metal arm and had been told to go to your house to have his arm fixed. He never forgot you. This came in handy for your second meeting.

Your second meeting was when you were 16. Your ‘parents’ were forcing you into the HYDRA lifestyle, and during your first day, as a punishment for refusing work, they put you in the room with him, purely to frighten you. However, as soon as he saw you, his cold eyes became slightly warmer, and the fear you felt slowly subsided as you realised he wasn’t planning on actually harming you. “…Hello.” You called quietly. He didn’t respond, and instead sat back down. Soon you were let out the room, and you didn’t see him till you were in your late 20’s, as you ran away from HYDRA not long after turning 18. He was also on the run from Hydra, and he ended up killing an agent who had found you. After that, you didn’t leave each other’s side, forming not only a friendship but also a relationship.

You were only reunited with your brother when Bucky was framed for murder. You knew immediately he was innocent, and as a desperate attempt to clear his name, you rushed back to America and stormed into Stark tower. The whole reason you hadn’t come back to your brother before was because you barely remembered him due to you being so young, but Tony knew as soon as he saw you, who you were. You were his baby sister, and here you were, fine, defending Barnes. He wasn’t convinced, and instead kept you under security protection ‘till everything is cleared up’. You found out about what had happened a few days later, though your distraught, angry brother.

“What happened?” You asked, seeing the cuts and bruises on his face. He had hatred in his eyes.

“Bucky killed our parent’s, Y/N.”

For a good week you were silent, not searching for what had happened to Bucky, trying to deal with the fact that the man you loved had been the reason you had gone through all that trauma as a child, why your brother and you were separated… why you met in the first place. It wasn’t until news reached you that Steve had helped his team out of imprisonment did the thought of maybe… you were missing something in the story. It took a bit of trying, but eventually with enough asking of Happy and Pepper, as well as Bucky trying in Wakanda to find out what happened to you, were you able to meet Natasha in private, who told you the whole story. That Bucky was under brainwash when it happened. It was the Winter Soldier, not him. Part of you always knew that it couldn’t have been him to do that. You knew Bucky was the victim in all of this. When you got the truth, you made the decision to go with Natasha to Wakanda to be with Bucky. You knew he needed you. But you also knew you had to say goodbye.

“Tony?” You asked. He barely turned from his desk. The bruises had gone yellow, and the cuts were turning into scabs, and his eyes were still a lot darker then how you remembered them when you were a child. “I’m… I’m going to Wakanda for a while.” You admitted.

“What? You’re going to him? To the man who killed our parents?” He asked, raising himself from his seat, clear distaste- hatred in his voice.

“Tony-“

“Y/N, how can you still love him? Knowing he’s the cause of our suffering?” He insisted.

“It wasn’t him! It was HYDRA! It was always HYDRA! HYDRA controlled him, they controlled me! Tony, please listen to me. I’ve known Bucky for years, I’ve seen him in his worse and his best. I’ve seen him as both the soldier and as James. They’re not the same… Tony. Please. I’ll come back- but I need to see him.” You begged.

He didn’t tell you to your face that he agreed, instead he got Natasha to come pick you up while he was busy with other work, so he wouldn’t have to say goodbye and question his decision.

When Bucky realised you were in Wakanda, it was when you were approaching him. His first reaction was just pure happiness. It was the happiest anyone around him had seen him in the recent weeks, seeing him calling your name, holding you tightly and just kissing you. It wasn’t until a good minute that he actually looked at you, and then he froze. He realised, he remembered, and guilt tore away all that happiness as he let go of you, leading you to where you were now.

“Bucky, please.” You begged, but he only seemed to curl up more in front of you. Did it discourage you? No. You didn’t come here to fail him. You knew he needed you, and you weren’t going to turn your back on him. You reached out, gently taking his hand that he had clutched against his stomach. He didn’t flinch, and he let you open his palm, and hold his hand, and he just stared at your hands. “I love you more than anything, James.”

“You shouldn’t.” He spoke up quietly. “I ruined your life. I destroyed your chances of a good life when I killed your parents.”

“James Buchanan Barnes.” You spoke sternly. “That is your name, not the Soldier who did it. You are not the Winter Soldier, there for you didn’t do it, you hear me?” You spoke strongly. Bucky finally looked up at you with those still hurt eyes. “I love you, James. This doesn’t change anything.” You assured. You finally felt him hold your hand in return, a soft smile covering your lips, before you carefully stood up, lent forward and kissing him. Finally, progress.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in!

*Not my gif

TAGS: @dailyteambucky @mxrvelsaos  @imbuckypositive @ari-maximoff  @abbybills22 @waywardemo @httpmcrvel @mutantjediavenger @theoraekensnotsosecretlover @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies @sebstanismylife

“Bucky, please.” You begged, but he only seemed to curl up more in front of you. Did it discourage you? No. You didn’t come here to fail him. You knew he needed you, and you weren’t going to turn your back on him. You reached out, gently taking his hand that he had clutched against his stomach. He didn’t flinch, and he let you open his palm, and hold his hand, and he just stared at your hands. “I love you more than anything, James.”

“You shouldn’t.” He spoke up quietly. “I ruined your life. I destroyed your chances of a good life when I killed your parents.”

“James Buchanan Barnes.” You spoke sternly. “That is your name, not the Soldier who did it. You are not the Winter Soldier, there for you didn’t do it, you hear me?” You spoke strongly. Bucky finally looked up at you with those still hurt eyes. “I love you, James. This doesn’t change anything.” You assured. You finally felt him hold your hand in return, a soft smile covering your lips, before you carefully stood up, lent forward and kissing him. Finally, progress.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in!

*Not my gif

TAGS: @dailyteambucky @mxrvelsaos  @imbuckypositive @ari-maximoff  @abbybills22 @waywardemo @httpmcrvel @mutantjediavenger @theoraekensnotsosecretlover @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies @sebstanismylife
trail.content_abstract:
Characters: Bucky Barnes x Fem!Reader, Tony Stark X Sister!Reader

Universe: Marvel, Avengers

Warnings: Spoilers of Civil War

Request: With the stark reader and Bucky one, can you do where he blames himself for the death of readers and Tony’s parents, but she still loves him, even though Tony doesn’t allow it. Eventually Tony and reader have a heart to heart and gives her his blessing. Bucky puts aside his guilt?

“James, please look at me.” You pleaded desperately. He was so broken. You were so broken… everything was so, so broken, in total shatters and here you were trying to pick up the pieces as best you could, and so far it was all failing.

Serena is thrown into the world of SHIELD whether she likes it or not.

What happens at SHIELD

My body felt numb, I couldn’t move a muscle. Finally, my eyes opened, and I took in my surroundings; a large lab, with lots of screens. I winced, looking at my bandages arm, the bandage red with dried…
